This app was created to be a convenient user-interface for the R package ‘fqacalc’. The app and package are hosted by the US Army Corps of Engineers, Engineer Research and Development Center (ERDC).

This app was created with funding from the Aquatic Nuisance Species Research Program under the Next Generation Ecological Model Development congressional add .

To report a mistake or unexpected issue on this webpage, contact - ecomodteam@usace.army.mil
